comments_additional_2.author: Old_Lab1576
comments_additional_2.body:
I don’t think your problem was pricing.

0% conversion usually means people don’t understand the urgency, not that it’s too expensive.

Right now "rank in AI search" still feels abstract. Writers don’t wake up thinking about GEO, they wake up thinking "I need traffic".

So when they hit pricing they ask one question:

Will this reliably get me more readers than WordPress + normal SEO?

If that answer isn’t obvious in 5 seconds they leave, free tier or not.

I’d test this instead of lowering price:

Show one real case:

Article before GEO
Article after GEO
Traffic change or AI citations

Make the value concrete not conceptual.

Because free users without belief won’t become paying users either, they’ll just churn slower.
